Function Documentation

uint64_t cvmx_compactflash_generate_dma_tim ( int  tim_mult,
const uint16_t *  ident_data,
int *  mwdma_mode_ptr,
int  chan 
)

This function takes values from the compact flash device identify response, and returns the appropriate value to write into the boot bus DMA timing register.

Parameters:
tim_mult Eclock timing multiple to use
[in] ident_data Data returned by the 'identify' command. This is used to determine the DMA modes supported by the card, if any.
[out] mwdma_mode_ptr Optional pointer to return MWDMA mode in
chan DMA channel number
Returns:
64 bit value to write to DMA timing register

This function takes values from the compact flash device identify response, and returns the appropriate value to write into the boot bus DMA timing register.

Parameters:
tim_mult timing multiplier, 1, 2, 4 or 8
[in] ident_data drive identification data
[out] mwdma_mode_ptr DMA mode selected
chan DMA channel
void cvmx_compactflash_set_piomode ( int  cs0,
int  cs1,
int  pio_mode 
)

Setup timing and region config to support a specific IDE PIO mode over the bootbus.

Parameters:
cs0 Bootbus region number connected to CS0 on the IDE device
cs1 Bootbus region number connected to CS1 on the IDE device
pio_mode PIO mode to set (0-6)
